text: Anatoma flexidentata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Anatomidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Geiger D.L. (2012) Monograph of the little slit shells. Volume 1. Introduction, Scissurellidae. pp. 1–728. Volume 2. Anatomidae, Larocheidae, Depressizonidae, Sutilizonidae, Temnocinclidae. pp. 729–1291. Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History Monographs Number 7 ==External links== Category:Anatomidae Category:Gastropods described in 2008
title: Anatoma flexidentata
